channel.title: Menu on PrestaShop Specs
channel.description: Recent content in Menu on PrestaShop Specs

item.title: Menu Tab
item.description: SPECS FOR THE MENU TAB HISTORY For the history, this page was present in 1.6 and allowed to add, edit, delete, activate / deactivate menus and reorganize them thanks to the position column. This page was removed in 1.7.0 because users were deleting menu entries but did not know how to re-add them with the controller name. SPECS The behavior in 1.7.X is: No “menu” tab in the BO menu (as in 1.
